data.name: My Room
data.description:
My Room is the game experience that allows you to interact with your friends and also create your own world.

Customize your character and explore our two game modes: Playground & My Room.

In the Playground you will find yourself in a multiplayer environment surrounded by minigames that are available to play with others. These games include:
- Soccer: score as many goals as you can
- Air Hockey (Arcade): play with the AI or with another player
- Basketball (Arcade): throw the balls and try to score points
- Cornhole (Arcade): have fun trying to score as you play with the bean bags
- Darts (Arcade): practice your aiming in the available stations
- Mini Golf (Arcade): try to aim the hole at the mini golf courses
The multiplayer also includes voice/text chat for you to communicate with other players

When in My Room, you will be able to customize your own space. You can choose between 3 different themed templates, explore and change it the way you prefer.

* Find more information about the gameplay itself the app*

Upcoming updates in the near future:
- Game monetary system
- Shop
- More games
- More rooms

Have fun!
